snippet.title: Bullet Noir - Official Announcement Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the shadows with Bullet Noir, an ambient twin-stick shooter where every move counts and every bullet could be your last. In this gritty, brutal world, you’ll follow the intertwining stories of four relentless characters, each driven by a burning desire to avenge the murder of their mentor.

Wishlist now: https://bit.ly/BulletNoir
